goals__remit: At Mexichem Fluor, our mission is to make fluorine work for our customers and for the benefit of society, and to create real value through innovation, quality and the best levels of service in our industry. Mexichem Fluor is part of Mexichem,  a leader in the chemical and petrochemical industry in Latin America, with more than 50 years of experience in the region and 28 years on the Mexican Stock Exchange (Bolsa de Valores de Mexico). Mexichem products are marketed worldwide and generate sales of more than USD 3 billion annually. For more information visit www.mexichemfluor.com
